info.name: Hide Adblock Plus context menu item
info.description:
Hides the 'Adblock Plus: block image...' context menu item when right-clicking images, image links.

For those who never use the menu item, and would prefer not to install an add-on just to hide it ;)

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);

menuitem[label="Adblock Plus: Block imageâ€¦"] { display: none !important; }
